Amalgamated Bank 
Corporate Social 
Responsibility 
(CSR) 
GovernanceSOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY IS EMBEDDED INTO OUR 
CORPORATE DNA, AND WE BELIEVE THAT IT IS 
VITAL TO OUR ONGOING SUCCESS
While CSR-oriented matters have always been part of our Board of 
Directors’ oversight, in 2019, we expanded the responsibilities of our 
Executive Committee of the Board of Directors to formally include CSR. 
Re-named the Executive and Corporate Social Responsibility Committee, 
its oversight includes assisting the Board in fulfilling its oversight 
responsibilities with respect to Amalgamated Bank’s development and 
implementation of corporate social responsibility initiatives.
